catalog.description: Personal, interactional, and structural aspects of organizations; motivation, decision making, problem-solving communication, leadership, organizational structure, change.
catalog.note: NOTE: Org B 321 will not substitute for this course. NOTE: Also offered by BYU Independent Study; enroll anytime throughout year; one year to complete; additional tuition required; register at is.byu.edu.
catalog.prerequisite: Psych 307 & Psych 309 & Psych 310; or instructor's consent.
catalog.title: Organizational Psychology.

course_headers.header_text: PSYCH 330: Also offered by BYU Independent Study; enroll anytime throughout year; one year to complete; additional tuition required; register at is.byu.edu.
